document_data.name: Simon Broven
document_data.mainbody:
'''Simon Broven''' was an inhabitant of the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] and a former [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I'm sorry, I don't think I can help you. I'm not fit for service.''|Twitch Broven}}
document_data.Description: Simon was a [[human]] man with light brown hair, eyes, and a light skin tone.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], [[healer]] Sylbert spent his days at the [[Harbourview Park]] in the Lower City, helping Simon's recovery after either suffering some trauma. The man lked to come to the Harbourview Park because of the silence he could find there. Even with Sylbert's help, he still had long road to recovery ahead.
